name: Pomodoro-app
body:
### Pomodoro application.

You can open [http://pomodoro-app.heroku.com/](http://pomodoro-app.heroku.com/) application to get more details of the app. It's pretty easy to install app to the iphone. Open website following by the link and add to the home screen with default icon. I was made app only for getting knowledge about writing offline/mobile/backbonejs/sinatra apps.

### Support or Contact
Having trouble with Pages? Contact alex.korsak@gmail.com and Iâ€™ll help you sort it out.
